original_text:
A sluggard is wiser in his own eyes
    than seven people who answer discreetly.
korean_text: 게으른 자는 사리에 맞게 대답하는 사람 일곱보다 자기를 지혜롭게 여기느니라

sentences.original_text: A sluggard is wiser in his own eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 게으른 자는 자기 눈에는 더 지혜롭다

sentences.original_text: than seven people who answer discreetly
